Package it.polimi.ingsw.xyl.model

Class Cosplayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.xyl.model.Cosplayer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Demeter, Hephaestus, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus
public class Cosplayer
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the role of the Player: God or Civilian

      public void move​(int worker, Direction direction)
      move method of cosplayer(Civilian Mod)
      Parameters:
      worker - '0' or '1' represent two workers (we call them worker A and B) of a player.
      direction - see Direction class.

    • build

      public void build​(int worker, Direction direction, boolean buildDome)
      build method of cosplayer(Civilian Mod)
      Parameters:
      worker - '0' or '1' represent two workers (we call them worker A and B) of a player.
      direction - see Direction class.
      buildDome - whether build dome directly (only for Atlas).

    • checkWin

      public void checkWin()
      checkWin() is used after every move: if one of your workers moves up on top of level 3 during your turn, you instantly win. checkWin() is used after each toNextPlayer(): if all of your workers cannot move, you lose. ( "You must always perform a move then build on your turn. If you are unable to, you lose." The only condition in which one is not able to build is "in a hole", that means, all the eight spaces are occupied by another workers or domes, but you can never get into a hole after an effective move.)

    • getAvailable

    • getAvailableMoves

      public java.util.ArrayList<Direction> getAvailableMoves​(int worker)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      all available direction of the worker.
